mention.text: Kramatorsk -LRB- VIDEO -RRB- RT s freelance reporter , Graham Phillips , claimed to have been shot at by Ukrainian soldiers as he approached them to engage in dialogue near the town of Kramatorsk
the video he was shooting at the time
